title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 3794/85 of 20 December 1985 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2742/75 with regard to production refunds applicable in Spain in the cereals sector
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EEC) N° 3794/85
of 20 December 1985
amending Regulation (EEC) N° 2742/75 with  regard to production refunds applicable in Spain in the cereals sector
THE COUNCIL  OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Regulation (EEC) N° 2742/75 is hereby  amended as follows:
1. The following paragraph 4 shall be added to Article 1 and 4:
'4. The production refunds referred to in the preceding paragraphs shall be adjusted in Spain by  the accession compensatory amount applicable to the product in respect of which the refund is  fixed.'
2. The following subparagraph is added to Article 2:
'The production refund referred to in the first subparagraph shall be adjusted in Spain on the  basis of the accession compensatory amount applicable to potato starch.'

This Regulation  shall enter into force on 1 March 1986, subject to the entry into force of the Treaty of Accession  of Spain and Portugal.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 December 1985.
For the Council
The President
R. STEICHEN
